entities.name: taur
entities.description: Taur is a centaur with an arm holding a bow, mentioned as having landed on the floor.

entities.name: potter
entities.description: Potter is Harry Potter, who is trying to win against Taur.

entities.name: goblin
entities.description: Goblins are mentioned as standing and beaming at the headless wizard.

relationships.description: Potter fears Taur, as evident from Potter's actions of backing away from her.
Potter is helped by the goblin in his fight against Taur.
